channel.title: dsPIC on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)
channel.description: Recent content in dsPIC on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)

item.title: Auto-pilote for Plane based on Simulink
item.description: Model based design for an RC plane autopilot

item.title: Inverted Pendulum
item.description: LQR stabilization of an inverted pendulum platform based on a low cost toy. Simulink model and generation of code for dsPIC Microchip microcontroller are provided (Rapid Control Prototyping : RCP)
